New Records: Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets for 57 runs in a World Cup semi-final
Daryl Mitchell scored 134 runs, the highest score in a World Cup semi-final
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored a century, his 50th in ODIs
Mohammed Shami took five wickets in a row
India won the match by 70 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed his team's joy at reaching the final
Kane Williamson congratulated India and praised their performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: India needed to score 398 to reach the final
India have won five games chasing and five games batting first in this World Cup
Others: The match was played at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai
The match was reduced to 40 overs per side due to rain
